resources.string: Cairo Guide
Sights
Restaurants
Events
Hotels
Cairo Guide
A New Sky, A New Trip!
The Pyramids of Giza
The last surviving of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World, the Pyramids of Giza are one of the world\'s most recognizable landmarks.
Location: Al-Ahram Street, Giza
The Egyptian Museum
The absolutely staggering collection of antiquities displayed in Cairo\'s Egyptian Museum makes it one of the world\'s great museums. You would need a lifetime to see everything on show.
Location: Midan al-Tahrir, Downtown
Al-Azhar Mosque

Al-Azhar Mosque is the finest building of Cairo\'s Fatimid era and one of the city\'s earliest surviving mosques, completed in AD 972. It\'s also one of the world\'s oldest universities and today, it is still the leading theological center of the Islamic world.
Location: Al-Azhar Street, Islamic Cairo District
Sultan Hassan Mosque

One of the finest examples of Mamluk architecture in the world, Sultan Hassan Mosque is a vision of Arabic artistry with an abundance of stalactite detailing and intricate arabesque features. It was built in 1356/63 for the Sultan Hassan el-Nasir.
Location: Midan Salah-ad-Din, Islamic Cairo District
Khan el-Khalili (Souq Quarter)

Khan el-Khalili is one of the world\'s great shopping experiences. This Middle Eastern souq (bazaar) is a labyrinthine collection of skinny alleyways established as a shopping district in AD 1400, which still rings with the clang of metal workers and silversmiths.
Location: Off Al-Azhar Street, Islamic Cairo District
The Citadel

In a commanding location at the foot of the Mokattam Hills, Cairo\'s citadel was built by Saladin in 1176. The original structure he laid out has long disappeared except for the eastern outer walls, but a legacy of rulers has made their own additions here.
Location: Off Midan Salah-ad-Din, Islamic Cairo District
Fairmont Nile City Hotel, Cairo
Like the city itself, Fairmont Nile City offers a delightful series of contrasts, combining advanced technology and modern design with local flavors and flair.
Location: Nile City Towers 2005 B Corniche، El Nil، Cairo
Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at Nile Plaza
Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at Nile Plaza offers luxury accommodations, fine dining, city views and more in the heart of Cairo\'s social and business scenes.
Location: 1089 CORNICHE EL NIL, Qasr El Nil, Cairo
The Nile Ritz-Carlton, Cairo
The Nile Ritz-Carlton, Cairo, located downtown, overlooks the Egyptian Museum and offers luxury weddings, catering, a spa and nine restaurants.
Location: 1113 Corniche El Nil, Ismailia, Qasr El Nil, Cairo
Kempinski Nile Hotel Cairo
Located in Cairo\'s affluent Garden City district, Kempinski Nile Hotel offers luxurious rooms on the shores of the Nile River.
Location: 12 Ahmed Ragheb, Qasr El Nil, Cairo
Royal Maxim Palace Kempinski Cairo
Royal Maxim Palace Kempinski Cairo is a 5-star hotel that offers luxury accommodations and is a haven of tranquillity in the heart of New Cairo.
Location: Ring Rd, Second New Cairo, Cairo
Heliopolis Towers Hotel
The Heliopolis Towers Hotel is set in the presidential quarter near Cairo International Airport, the business district and the Cairo International Convention Centre.
Location:El Shaheed Sayed Zakaria, Sheraton Al Matar, El Nozha, Cairo
ICEC (Intelligent Cities Exhibition And Conference) 2020
The 6th annual ICEC is the region\'s leading smart and sustainable cities event to be held late October 2020 in Cairo, Egypt.
Date: Tue, Oct 27, 2020, 9:00 AM EET
Cairo Technology Week 2020

Cairo Technology Week is the most exclusive technology event which brings together global vendors, technology providers, systems integrators and the most influential ICT decision makers from various sectors .
Date: Tue, Oct 27, 2020, 9:00 AM –Wed, Oct 28, 2020, 11:00 PM EET
Egypt National Cybersecurity CTF 2020

In cooperation with Trend Micro, as a strategic partner, CyberTalents is organizing Egypt National Cybersecurity CTF for the fourth time consecutively where participants can demonstrate their technical abilities so we can discover the best cybersecurity talents in Egypt.
Date: Sat, October 3, 2020 10:00 AM – 4:00 PM EET
Cairo: Not Sure When, But Then! with Matt Davis
Join us for an internationally-minded hour of hilarious, challenging comedy with Matt Davis!
Date: Tue, January 19, 2021 8:00 PM – 11:00 PM EET
EGYMEDICA and EGYLAB MEDICINE

The Main gate for all medical sectors in Egypt and all Africa Egymedica is the biggest and oldest exhibition and confrence in Egypt and all Africa, that has the biggest number of visitors and the biggest deals in medical field.
Date: Thu, Apr 1, 2021, 10:00 AM EET
Build a startup community in your city
Would you like to start a startup community but have no resources of your own? Waxdale Pitch Studios is looking for Ecosystem Leaders to operate startup communities in exchange for equity.
Date: Thu, May 20, 2021, 01:00 PM EET
Al Khal Egyptian Restaurant
Al Khal offers the finest traditional Egyptian dishes and delights in a classic atmosphere with a modern twist.
Opening Hours: All Week from 01:00PM to 01:00AM
Location: Citystars Heliopolis
Culina

The open kitchen at Culina offers both temptation and entertainment. Chefs at the all-day dining restaurant prepare an array of international and local dishes, offering buffet-style for breakfast and lunch, while a la carte for dinner.
Opening Hours: All Week from 06:30AM to 11:00PM
Location: 1113 Corniche El Nil, DownTown, Cairo
Koshary Abou Tarek
Few Cairo baladi eateries rise to international acclaim. Abou Tarek is probably the only restaurant in Cairo that has been featured on CNN, where customers can have a meal for 5LE.
Opening Hours: All Week from 06:00AM to 11:00PM
Location: Choppin In Champollion Area, Cairo
Fayruz Lebanese Restaurant
Guests familiar with the flavors and spices of Lebanese cuisine will find them blended to perfection at Fayruz.
Opening Hours: All Week from 01:00PM to 01:00AM
Location: Omar Ibn El-Khattab Street, Nasr City, Cairo
Esplanade Cafe Restaurant
From tasty snacks to à la carte meals to full buffet dinners with live cooking by top chefs, the Esplanade offers 24-hour variety without compromising on quality.
Opening Hours: All Week 24 Hours
Location: Omar Ibn El-Khattab Street, Nasr City, Cairo
Bab Al Qasr
The finest of oriental cuisines in Cairo infused with Egyptian and Levant flavours and a subtle combination of spices.
Opening Hours: All Week from 07:00PM to 00:00AM
Location: Second New Cairo, Royal Maxim, Cairo
